price: (58) Indeed, it is Allāh who is the [continual] Provider,[1548] the firm possessor of strength.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ
footnotes: [1548]- Providing everything required by His creations during their decreed existence.  His provision includes guidance.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
